body: @nigeltao just to clarify, I'm not expecting SVG, but as you put it "Go2D". If that can cleanly ride on shiny, cool. I'll restate that doing transforms on GUI elements is useful.  [OpenVG]( https://github.com/ajstarks/openvg) is an experiment with what is possible with a simple 2D API, but it lacks things like input support and animation that I would look to something like shiny to provide.
